amendment.description: To provide for the optional purchase of insurance against loss resulting from physical damage to or loss of real property or personal property related thereto located in the United States arising from any flood or windstorm.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4719 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 19 - 74. Record Vote Number: 117.

action.text: Amendment SA 4719 proposed by Senator Wicker to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3850-3851, S3856, S3859-3861, S3877-3878; text: CR S3850-3851) To provide for the optional purchase of insurance against loss resulting from physical damage to or loss of real property or personal property related thereto located in the United States arising from any flood or windstorm.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4719 proposed by Senator Wicker to Amendment SA 4707.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4719 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 19 - 74. Record Vote Number: 117.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4719 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 19 - 74. Record Vote Number: 117.
